traits.Hold Breath: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.
traits.Underwater Camouflage: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.
traits.Water Breathing: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

actions.Tentacles: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 10+1d4 + 8). Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.
actions.Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Lo: A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.
